attributes.action: Stop charges for nurses at all UK hospitals permanently
attributes.additional_details: Nurses have shown their dedication to their craft over the Corona virus pandemic, now they've lost their own helping us, we say it's OK, now we can charge you again. How is this fair? How is this a representation of what you claim to show gratitude for?
attributes.background: It is abhorrent to charge nurses parking fees to work, at their place of work. Some nurses are even charged twice. This article gives examples (https://www.theguardian.com/society/shortcuts/2017/jul/17/bad-for-your-wealth-why-parking-fees-are-taxing-for-nhs-nurses}
